snippet.title: Monstercraft
snippet.description: Monstercraft RPG game. Buy new monsters and grow them in a lab to get ready for serious battles.

snippet.title: Wormcraft
snippet.description: Wormcraft Use various tools to guide the worms to the exit.

snippet.title: GemCraft
snippet.description: GemCraft Excellent Tower Defense game. Use gems to put an end to the threatening waves of corruption.

snippet.title: GemCraft: Gem of Eternity
snippet.description: GemCraft: Gem of Eternity Tower defense game in which you have to combine gems to build defense towers.

snippet.title: BridgeCraft
snippet.description: BridgeCraft Physics based puzzle game. Help the Euwins to rebuild their city by contstructing new bridges.

snippet.title: Kids vs. Ice Cream
snippet.description: Kids vs. Ice Cream Use your upgradable ice cream cannon to defend your truck against the ice cream obsessed children.

snippet.title: Cellcraft
snippet.description: Cellcraft Strategy game. Build a cell, look for acids and fuel to fight off virusses and save the platypus species.

snippet.title: Birdy's Rainy Day Skipathon
snippet.description: Birdy's Rainy Day Skipathon Try to get to the exit platform en remove all other platforms to get to the next level.

snippet.title: Spacecraft
snippet.description: Spacecraft Sidescrolling strategy game. Defend your spaceship from the enemy and attack its base to prevale.

snippet.title: Control Craft
snippet.description: Control Craft Strategy game. Take over all the enemy colonies by sending troops to take out the enemy units.
